Kapparukkhiya Thera：An arahant．Ninety-four kappas ago he placed a kappa-rukkha made of cloth of various colours in front of the thūpa of the Buddha Siddhattha．



Seven kappas ago he was king eight times under the name of Sucela （Ap．i．90f）．



He is probably identical with Kappa Thera．ThagA．i．521f．
